function.name: ClientLoadGridNav
function.DescriptionEN: Tell clients that they need to load gridnav information. Used for things like allowing clients to identify valid locations to place buildings.
function.DescriptionCN: 通知客户端需要载入网格信息，可用于允许客户端确定允许建筑的区域等

function.name: SetAlwaysShowPlayerInventory
function.DescriptionEN: Show the player hero's inventory in the HUD, regardless of what unit is selected.
function.DescriptionCN: 在HUD中显示玩家英雄的物品栏，不管选择了哪个单位

function.name: SetBotThinkingEnabled
function.DescriptionEN: Enables/Disables bot thinking. Requires a very Dota PvP-like map with 3 lanes, a shop, etc.
function.DescriptionCN: 允许/禁止机器人思考，需要与Dota PvP高度相似的三路线地图、商店等

function.name: SetCameraDistanceOverride
function.DescriptionEN: Set a different camera distance; dota default is 1134.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置默认的镜头距离。Dota默认为1134

function.name: SetCustomBuybackCooldownEnabled
function.DescriptionEN: Turns on capability to define custom buyback cooldowns.
function.DescriptionCN: 开启该选项来允许自定义买活冷却时间

function.name: SetCustomBuybackCostEnabled
function.DescriptionEN: Turns on capability to define custom buyback costs.
function.DescriptionCN: 开启该选项来允许自定义买活花费

function.name: SetCustomHeroMaxLevel
function.DescriptionEN: Allows definition of the max level heroes can achieve (default is 25).
function.DescriptionCN: 定义最大英雄等级（默认为25）

function.name: SetCustomXPRequiredToReachNextLevel
function.DescriptionEN: Allows definition of a?table?of hero XP values.

function.name: SetFogOfWarDisabled
function.DescriptionEN: Turn the fog of war on or off.

function.name: SetGoldSoundDisabled
function.DescriptionEN: Turn the sound when gold is acquired off/on. Takes a?bool.
function.DescriptionCN: 是否禁止获取金钱时的声音提示

function.name: SetOverrideSelectionEntity
function.DescriptionEN: Set an override for the default selection entity, instead of each player's hero.
function.DescriptionCN: 覆盖默认选择实体，替代所有玩家的英雄

function.name: SetRecommendedItemsDisabled
function.DescriptionEN: Turn the panel for showing recommended items at the shop off/on. Takes a?bool.
function.DescriptionCN: 是否禁止显示商店中的推荐购买物品

function.name: SetRemoveIllusionsOnDeath
function.DescriptionEN: Make it so illusions are immediately removed upon death, rather than sticking around for a few seconds.
function.DescriptionCN: 使幻象死亡时立即消失，而不是延迟数秒

function.name: SetTopBarTeamValue
function.DescriptionEN: Set the team values on the top game bar.

function.name: SetTopBarTeamValuesOverride
function.DescriptionEN: Override the values of the team values on the top game bar.
function.DescriptionCN: 是否覆盖顶端的队伍数值

function.name: SetTopBarTeamValuesVisible
function.DescriptionEN: Turning on/off the team values on the top game bar.

function.name: SetUseCustomHeroLevels
function.DescriptionEN: Turn on custom-defined XP values for hero level ups. The?table?should be defined before switching this on.
function.DescriptionCN: 开关自定义英雄英雄经验表，该表必须提前被定义
